text: Sir Robert George Wyndham Herbert (1831-1905) was the first Premier of Queensland. He was premier twice, the first time when Queensland became an independent colony, from 10 December 1859 to 1 February 1866 and then again from 20 July 1866 to 7 August 1866. He was educated at Eton College and Balliol College, Oxford. ==References== Category:1905 deaths Category:1831 births Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:English LGBT people Category:Gay men Category:Australian LGBT politicians Category:People educated at Eton College Category:People from Brighton Category:Politicians from Sussex Category:Premiers of Queensland
title: Robert Herbert
